rooms.description: Spacious entrance with a foyer that leads to the living area and connects to the garage.
Open-plan living space adjoining the kitchen. Vastu alignment ensures energy flow from east to west.
Functional kitchen area with modern amenities and provisions for an island counter.
Spacious master bedroom located in the north-east quadrant to align with Vastu principles for prosperity. Includes a private balcony.
Dedicated entertainment space with acoustics and seating designed for comfort, located towards the south-west to minimize noise interference.
Functional dining area adjacent to the living room and kitchen.
Well-planned bathroom with modern fixtures, located near the master bedroom for convenience.
Double-car garage designed to accommodate two vehicles, positioned on the west side of the plot following local building norms.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligning with Vastu for positive energy flow.
East-facing windows to enhance natural light and morning sun as per Vastu principles.
Additional ventilation window for effective cross breeze.
